snippet: The a senior program director at the Lasker Foundation prefers bicycling eight miles to work to ensure that he will be outdoors for at least part of the day.
abstract: Preoccupations column features Lasker Foundation senior program director David Keegan discussing bicycling eight miles to work in New York City to ensure that he will be outdoors for at least part of the day.
lead_paragraph: The a senior program director at the Lasker Foundation prefers bicycling eight miles to work to ensure that he will be outdoors for at least part of the day.

headline.print_headline: Pedal To Work, And Smell The Roses
headline.seo: A Bicycle Commute Lets You Smell the Roses
headline.main: Pedal to Work, and Smell the Roses
